name: Bunnyball Janitor (Kiwijam Entry 2021)
description:
Play as a small robot tasked with cleaning up trash by magnetizing it to your body! try and "Adapt" to moving around awkward clusters of detritus and go for a high score.

A small project made for the Kiwi Game Jam 2021, with the theme of Adapt!

Controls:
Move  - Left Stick/WASD
Camera - Right Stick /Mouse
Jump - A Button/Left Click
Drop Trash - B Button/RightClick

Once you've grabbed some trash, it also becomes magnetized and can stick to other trash! carry as much as you can into the green checkered cube to increase your score.
